pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - GameBart: Your Data, Our Commitment gamebart@gmail.com +46-651-126-91 18+ gamebart Home Immerse yourself Why are we Safety Selected games About Us Privacy Policy Third-Party Links and Services Our platform may contain links to third-party websites, services, or advertisements that are not owned or controlled by us. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or the content of these third-party sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party sites you visit or services you use. Cookies and Similar Technologies We may use cookies and similar technologies, such as web beacons, pixels, and local storage, to collect and store information about your use of our services. Cookies are small data files stored on your device that help us improve your user experience, remember your preferences, and analyze how you interact with our platform. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings, but please note that disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our services. Data Retention Periods We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide you with our services and fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. The criteria used to determine our retention periods include: a. The length of time we have an ongoing relationship with you and provide our services to you. b. Whether there is a legal obligation to which we are subject, such as contractual obligations or applicable laws, that require us to retain your information for a certain period. c. Whether retention is advisable in light of our legal position, such as in regard to applicable statutes of limitations, litigation, or regulatory investigations. Cross-Border Data Transfers Gamebart is based in Sweden, and your personal information may be processed and stored on servers located in Sweden or other countries where our service providers are located. As a result, your personal information may be transferred to, stored, or processed in jurisdictions outside your country of residence, including countries that may not provide the same level of data protection as your jurisdiction. We take appropriate measures to ensure that your personal information remains protected in accordance with this Privacy Policy and applicable law when transferred internationally. These measures include entering into data transfer agreements based on the European Commission's Standard Contractual Clauses or relying on other approved data transfer mechanisms, such as the EU-US Privacy Shield Framework, where applicable. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any material changes to this Privacy Policy by posting the revised version on our website and updating the "Last Updated" date at the top of the Policy. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any updates or changes. pages.about: About Us - GameBart: Discover Our Story and Mission gamebart@gmail.com +46-651-126-91 18+ gamebart Home Immerse yourself Why are we Safety Selected games About Us Get to Know Us About GameBart Welcome to GameBart, your go-to destination for a unique and thrilling social casino experience. We are dedicated to bringing you the best in online gaming, combining the excitement of the casino with the fun of social interaction. Our platform is designed to provide endless entertainment, ensuring that every moment you spend with us is packed with excitement and joy. 1. Our Mission To create a safe, fun, and engaging environment where players can enjoy realistic casino games while connecting with friends and fellow enthusiasts. 2. Our Vision To be the leading social casino platform that players around the world turn to for an unparalleled gaming experience. 3. Our Values Integrity, innovation, and customer satisfaction are at the core of everything we do at GameBart. 4. Our Team A diverse group of dedicated professionals committed to delivering top-notch gaming experiences. 5. Our Community A vibrant, welcoming community of players who share a passion for casino games. 6. Our Promise To continually innovate and provide a secure, enjoyable, and dynamic platform for all our players. Our Story GameBart was founded with the vision of creating a unique online destination where players could enjoy the thrill of the casino without the risks associated with real gambling. Since our inception, we have grown into a vibrant community, bringing together players from around the globe to share in the excitement of our games. Our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction has driven us to continuously improve and expand our offerings, making GameBart a leader in the social casino space. Our Games At GameBart, we take pride in offering a diverse selection of high-quality games designed to entertain and engage players of all levels. From classic casino staples like blackjack and poker to innovative new slot games, our library is constantly evolving to keep the experience fresh and exciting. Each game is crafted with care, ensuring top-notch graphics, smooth gameplay, and immersive experiences that transport you straight to the casino floor. Join the GameBart Community We believe that gaming is more fun when shared with others. That's why GameBart is not just about playing games, but also about building connections and fostering a sense of community. Whether you're a seasoned player or new to the world of casino games, you'll find a welcoming environment where you can learn, compete, and make new friends. Join us in tournaments, participate in special events, and climb the leaderboards to show off your skills. Connect and Compete Challenge friends and players from around the world in our exciting tournaments and competitions.
